action.text: SA 6517 fell when SA 6516 was withdrawn.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 6517 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 6516 (the instructions of the motion to refer). To modify the effective date.
